Material used.Description: Neurons and neuronal cell lines undergo cell death after expression of mutant protein.

Readout description.Result Description: Inclusion bodies were observed in cells expressing mutant dardarin protein.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed, and results showed consistent effects of mutant dardarin on cell death and inclusion body formation.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control in cell culture experiments.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control in cell culture experiments.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
